sections: Thank you for recently joining our political action.

was founded to hold the powerful accountable through breaking news about corruption and money in politics, all from our staff of dedicated investigative journalists. When you joined our political action, you also gained access to our free newsletter sharing critical news. Welcome to our team!
If you don't want to get our newsletter, providing you updates on this and other major issues, you can unsubscribe at the bottom of this email, or any emails we send you.

’s founder and editor-in-chief. Among other things, I’ve been a longtime investigative reporter, a presidential campaign speechwriter for Bernie Sanders, and co-creator of the hit Netflix climate film

My colleagues and I started this news outlet as an independent, reader-supported investigative journalism organization that covers politics, business, and corporate power. We follow the money to uncover corruption, regardless of party or position. Ultimately, we believe that an effective citizen is an informed citizen. So we aim to keep you informed.
To get the most out of your subscription, do the following 4 things now (they won’t take long):

via the “Log In” option in the top menu. If you don’t see that option, you are already logged in. Our website doesn’t use passwords, for your protection, so just follow the prompts on the “Log In” page.
Follow us on any social and news channels you use by clicking the links below:
podcast on your podcast player of choice and subscribe by
Ensure our emails don’t end up getting blocked or sent to your spam folder by adding editor@levernews.com to your email provider’s safe sender list. Also,
to learn how to make sure our emails don’t go to your Promotions folder, and other important information about how to manage your account and the newsletter.
Most weekdays, you will receive our latest story delivered to your inbox. Each piece is deeply reported, thoroughly fact-checked, and carefully edited by our team.

Occasionally, we will send you information about supporting subscriber-only features, such as previews of exclusive content like Cheat Sheet, Lever Weekly, and You Love To See It, and details of upcoming special live events, where supporting subscribers interact with high-profile guests. To find out more about our paid subscription options and benefits,
For more information on how to log in and use our site, change your account options, and cancel your subscription, check out our
If you ever need to reach us, keep these emails handy:
Send tech, subscription, and website support questions to support@levernews.com

Once again, thank you for joining our team. With your support, we are building a new kind of news outlet. In the coming days, along with our latest news posts, you will be receiving a few additional notes from me about
. In the meantime, if you have questions or comments, please respond to this email and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
